alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 7:19PM CST until February 09 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River At Dallas. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural lands used for cattle grazing will occur. Low water crossings near the river will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 32.8 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 33.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
